attributes.action: something to happen when we make a petition instead of the usual fobbing off.
attributes.background: Sick of signing these petitions for no reason nothing ever actually gets done about it so what's the point of even making one? its about time the government actually started listening to us and making some changes when we ask for them

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. If you would like to see the Petitions Committee have greater powers, you could start a petition outlining what powers you would like the Petitions Committee to have.
